message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really like it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $140, but I'm willing to make a slight concession. I can sell it to you for $165.
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'd be willing to pay $145 for the product. Is that a price you'd be willing to accept?
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not quite ready to sell it to you for $145. I'm willing to make one more concession, and I can sell it to you for $170.
